channel.title: 2 good ways to make RS gold (Really works!)
channel.description: #1 Kill guards, or Goblins and get the Grapes they drop(sells for 600gp a piece, so 24k I think per inv...) Make a clan where ALOT of people buy one of an item, and when the price is high everyone sells that item. (Everyone makes money with this...)

item.title: 2 good ways to make RS gold (Really works!)
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Money making methods go in this thread.

Oh, and you can’t ask for reputation.

Read full topic
